name: Agent
description: Self-adaptive AI powered smartphone. +2 to Library Search. +2 to Wardrobe and Style under some circumstances.

name: Airhypo
description: Easy to use drug distribution platform.

name: Anti-Smog Breathing Mask
description: Useful for filtering out airborne toxins.

name: Audio Recorder
description: Records up to 24 hours of sound on a single Memory Chip.

name: Auto Level Dampening Ear Protectors
description: Compact ear protection. Makes user immune to effects caused by dangerously loud sounds.

name: Binoculars
description: Good for seeing far away. x2 or x3 magnification.

name: Braindance Viewer
description: Allows viewer to experience braindance.

name: Bug Detector
description: Beeps when within 2m/yds of a listening device.

name: Carryall
description: Bag for carrying stuff.

name: Chemical Analyzer
description: Can test chemical composition of substance against a database of samples.

name: Computer
description: Laptop or desktop computer.

name: Cyberdeck
description: Basic deck for netrunning. 7 slots.

name: Disposable Cellphone
description: Makes calls. Easy to dump if needed.

name: Drum Synthesizer
description: Can simulate almost any type of drum. Needs amp.

name: Duct Tape
description: Comes in many colors, including glow-in-the-dark.

name: Musical Instrument
description: Good for making music. Electric versions need amp.

name: Flashlight
description: 100m//yd beam of light. Lasts 10 hours on a charge.

name: Food Stick
description: One awful meal in bar form.

name: Glow Paint
description: Glow in dark spraypaint.

name: Glow Stick
description: Illuminates up to 4m/yds. Lasts for 10 hours.

name: Grapple Gun
description: Fires a grapple line up to 30m/yds. Cannot be used as a weapon.

name: Handcuffs
description: Restraints. Requires BODY >10 to break.

name: Homing Tracer
description: Can follow a linked tracer up to 1-mile away.

name: Sleeping Bag
description: Self-inflating mattress w/ sleeping bag.

name: Kibble Pack
description: One meal's worth of Kibble.

name: Lockpicking Set
description: Used to crack mechanical locks.

name: Medscanner
description: Helps diagnose illness and injury. +2 to First Aid and Paramedic.

name: Medtech Bag
description: A full medical toolkit in a bag.

name: Memory Chip
description: Standard data storage device.

name: MRE
description: Self-heating plastic and foil meal bag.

name: Personal Care Pack
description: Everything you need to clean up.

name: Pocket Amplifier
description: Can support up to two instruments. Lasts 6 hours per charge.

name: Radar Detector
description: Beeps if within 100m/yd of an active radar beam.

name: Radiation Suit
description: Protects you from radiation.

name: Radio Communicator
description: Earpiece. One mile range.

name: Radio Scanner
description: Play the hottest music or tune into radio bands within 1-mile.

name: Road Flare
description: Lights up an area of 100m/yd for 1 hour.

name: Rope
description: Nylon rope.

name: Scrambler
description: Scrambles/descrambles communications.

name: Smart Glasses
description: Technologically enhanced glasses. Has 2 slots for Cyberoptic Options.

name: Tech Bag
description: Small bag of tools for fixing stuff.

name: Techscanner
description: Helps diagnose broken tech. +2 to multiple TECH-based Skills.

name: Techtool
description: An all-in-one multitool.

name: Camping Equipment
description: Gear for one person to camp in a tent.

name: Vial of Biotoxin
description: Does damage 3d6. Resisted by Resist Torture/Drugs. Not affected by armor.

name: Vial of Poison
description: Does damage 2d6. Resisted by Resist Torture/Drugs. Not affected by armor.

name: Video Camera
description: Record up to 12 hours of audio and video on a single memory chip.

name: Virtuality Goggles
description: Projects cyberspace imagery over real world view.
